page.title: 01Leeswood and district
page.content: Leeswood is a peaceful place and has many interesting and amusing places. We have a number of picturesque churches and chapels in the area. The best place to look at the beauty of the area is from the top of Hope Mountain from where you can see part of Cheshire and Merseyside. In Coed Talon there is an old railway line which used to be in use,but now is shut down.There is now a pub there which is called The Railway Inn to mark the spot. We have a craft centre on the side of Hope Mountain and also a cafe which lots of people go to for dinner or for tea.
